name: Vector Erase
description:
Vector Erase is an in-development twinstick shooter in which you shoot simple vector graphics and survive as long as you are able.

This is extremely early, name will probably be changed.

You cna use either gamepad, mouse or keyboard to play, however you currently need to start the game with the gamepad unplugged if you wish to play with the keyboard. If using keyboard, use ASDW to move, and arrow keys to shoot, or point where you want to shoot with the mouse and it will shoot automatically. Move the mouse off the game window if you wish to use keyboard to shoot. If using gamepad, use left stick to move and right stick to shoot. Press r to restart the game. press u to spawn more circles.

The source code is licensed AGPLv3 and can be found here: https://git.sr.ht/~pkill9/love2d-twinstick
